<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>said,<s%> <S%H560><s%> "I was <S%H2370>looking<s%> in my <S%H2376>vision<s%> by <S%H3916>night,<s%> and <S%H718>behold,<s%> the <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7308>winds<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> were <S%H1519>stirring<s%> up the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H3221>sea.<s%>
"And <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts<s%> were <S%H5559>coming<s%> up from the <S%H3221>sea,<s%> <S%H8133>different<s%> from <S%H1668>one<s%> <S%H1668>another.<s%>

"The <S%H6933>first<s%> [was] like a <S%H744>lion<s%> and had [the] <S%H1611>wings<s%> of an <S%H5403>eagle.<s%> I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H1768><s%> its <S%H1611>wings<s%> were <S%H4804>plucked,<s%> and it was <S%H5191>lifted<s%> up from the <S%H772>ground<s%> and <S%H6966>made<s%> to <S%H6966>stand<s%> on two <S%H7271>feet<s%> like a <S%H606>man;<s%> a <S%H606>human<s%> <S%H3825>mind<s%> also was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

"And <S%H718>behold,<s%> <S%H321>another<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> a <S%H8578>second<s%> one, <S%H1821>resembling<s%> a <S%H1678>bear.<s%> And it was <S%H6966>raised<s%> up on <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H7859>side,<s%> and <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5967>ribs<s%> [were] in its <S%H6433>mouth<s%> <S%H997>between<s%> its <S%H8128>teeth;<s%> and <S%H3652>thus<s%> they <S%H560>said<s%> to it, <S%H6966>'Arise,<s%> <S%H399>devour<s%> <S%H7690>much<s%> <S%H1321>meat!<s%>'

<S%H870>"After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking,<s%> and <S%H718>behold,<s%> <S%H321>another<s%> one, like a <S%H5245>leopard,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> had on its <S%H1355>back<s%> <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H1611>wings<s%> of a <S%H5776>bird;<s%> the <S%H2423>beast<s%> also had <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7217>heads,<s%> and <S%H7985>dominion<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

<S%H870>"After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions,<s%> and <S%H718>behold,<s%> a <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> <S%H1763>dreadful<s%> and <S%H9015>terrifying<s%> and <S%H3493>extremely<s%> <S%H8624>strong;<s%> and it had <S%H7229>large<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H8128>teeth.<s%> It <S%H399>devoured<s%> and <S%H1855>crushed,<s%> and <S%H7512>trampled<s%> <S%H7512>down<s%> the <S%H7606>remainder<s%> with its <S%H7271>feet;<s%> and it was <S%H8133>different<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> that were <S%H6925>before<s%> it, and it had <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns.<s%>

"While I was <S%H7920>contemplating<s%> the <S%H7162>horns,<s%> <S%H431>behold,<s%> <S%H321>another<s%> <S%H7162>horn,<s%> a <S%H2192>little<s%> <S%H2192>one,<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> up <S%H997>among<s%> them, and <S%H8532>three<s%> of the <S%H6933>first<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> were <S%H6132>pulled<s%> out by the <S%H6132>roots<s%> <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925><s%> it; and <S%H431>behold,<s%> <S%H1668>this<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%> possessed <S%H5870>eyes<s%> like the <S%H5870>eyes<s%> of a <S%H606>man,<s%> and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> <S%H4449>uttering<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> [boasts.]

"I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> <S%H5705>Until<s%> <S%H1768><s%> <S%H3764>thrones<s%> were <S%H7412>set<s%> up, And the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>Days<s%> <S%H3488>took<s%> [His] <S%H3488>seat;<s%> His <S%H3831>vesture<s%> [was] like <S%H2358>white<s%> <S%H8517>snow,<s%> And the <S%H8177>hair<s%> of His <S%H7217>head<s%> like <S%H5343>pure<s%> <S%H6015>wool.<s%> His <S%H3764>throne<s%> [was] <S%H7631>ablaze<s%> with <S%H7631>flames,<s%> Its <S%H1535>wheels<s%> [were] a <S%H1815>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fire.<s%>

"A <S%H5103>river<s%> of <S%H5135>fire<s%> was <S%H5047>flowing<s%> And <S%H5312>coming<s%> out from <S%H6925>before<s%> Him; <S%H506>Thousands<s%> upon <S%H506>thousands<s%> were <S%H8120>attending<s%> Him, And <S%H7240>myriads<s%> upon <S%H7240>myriads<s%> were <S%H6966>standing<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> Him; The <S%H1780>court<s%> <S%H3488>sat,<s%> And the <S%H5609>books<s%> were <S%H6606>opened.<s%>

<S%H116>"Then<s%> I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> <S%H4481>because<s%> of the <S%H7032>sound<s%> of the <S%H7229>boastful<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> the <S%H7162>horn<s%> was <S%H4449>speaking;<s%> I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H1768><s%> the <S%H2423>beast<s%> was <S%H6992>slain,<s%> and its <S%H1655>body<s%> was destroyed and <S%H7>given<s%> to the <S%H3052>burning<s%> <S%H3346>fire.<s%>

"As for the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2423>beasts,<s%> their <S%H7985>dominion<s%> was <S%H5709>taken<s%> <S%H5709>away,<s%> but an <S%H754>extension<s%> of <S%H2417>life<s%> was <S%H3052>granted<s%> to them for an <S%H2166>appointed<s%> <S%H2166>period<s%> of <S%H5732>time.<s%>

"I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions,<s%> And <S%H718>behold,<s%> with the <S%H6050>clouds<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> One like a <S%H1247>Son<s%> of <S%H606>Man<s%> was <S%H858>coming,<s%> And He <S%H4291>came<s%> up to the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>Days<s%> And was <S%H7127>presented<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> Him.

"And to Him was <S%H3052>given<s%> <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> <S%H3367>Glory<s%> and a <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> That <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>peoples,<s%> <S%H524>nations,<s%> and [men of every] <S%H3961>language<s%> Might <S%H6399>serve<s%> Him. His <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion<s%> <S%H1768>Which<s%> will not <S%H5709>pass<s%> <S%H5709>away;<s%> And His <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is one <S%H1768>Which<s%> will not be <S%H2255>destroyed.<s%>
"As for me, <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> my <S%H7308>spirit<s%> was <S%H3735>distressed<s%> <S%H1459>within<s%> me, and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> in my <S%H7217>mind<s%> kept <S%H927>alarming<s%> me.

"I <S%H7127>approached<s%> <S%H2298>one<s%> of those who were <S%H6966>standing<s%> by and began <S%H1156>asking<s%> him the <S%H3330>exact<s%> <S%H3330>meaning<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1836>this.<s%> So he <S%H560>told<s%> me and <S%H3046>made<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of these things: <S%H4406><s%>

<S%H459>'These<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are <S%H703>four<s%> [in number,] are <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> [who] will <S%H6966>arise<s%> from the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

'But the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>Highest<s%> <S%H5946>One<s%> will <S%H6902>receive<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> and <S%H2631>possess<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H5957>forever,<s%> for <S%H5957>all<s%> <S%H5957>ages<s%> to <S%H5957>come.<s%>'

<S%H116>"Then<s%> I <S%H6634>desired<s%> to <S%H3321>know<s%> the <S%H3321>exact<s%> <S%H3321>meaning<s%> of the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was <S%H8133>different<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> the others, <S%H3493>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1763>dreadful,<s%> with its <S%H8128>teeth<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and its <S%H2953>claws<s%> of <S%H5174>bronze,<s%> [and which] <S%H399>devoured,<s%> <S%H1855>crushed,<s%> and <S%H7512>trampled<s%> <S%H7512>down<s%> the <S%H7606>remainder<s%> with its <S%H7271>feet,<s%>

and [the meaning] of the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> that [were] on its <S%H7217>head,<s%> and the <S%H321>other<s%> <S%H7162>[horn<s%>] <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> up, and <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925><s%> which <S%H8532>three<s%> [of them] <S%H5308>fell,<s%> namely, that horn which had <S%H5870>eyes<s%> and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> <S%H4449>uttering<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> [boasts,] and which was <S%H7229>larger<s%> in <S%H2376>appearance<s%> <S%H4481>than<s%> its <S%H2273>associates.<s%>
"I <S%H1934>kept<s%> <S%H2370>looking,<s%> and that <S%H7162>horn<s%> was <S%H5648>waging<s%> <S%H7129>war<s%> with the <S%H6922>saints<s%> and <S%H3202>overpowering<s%> them

<S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H1768><s%> the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>Days<s%> <S%H858>came,<s%> and <S%H1780>judgment<s%> was <S%H3052>passed<s%> in favor of the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>Highest<s%> <S%H5946>One,<s%> and the <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H4291>arrived<s%> when the <S%H6922>saints<s%> <S%H2631>took<s%> <S%H2631>possession<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H3652>"Thus<s%> he <S%H560>said:<s%> 'The <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%> will be a <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> on the <S%H772>earth,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> will be <S%H8133>different<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> the [other] <S%H4437>kingdoms,<s%> and it will <S%H399>devour<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth<s%> and <S%H1759>tread<s%> it <S%H1759>down<s%> and <S%H1855>crush<s%> it.

'As for the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns,<s%> out of this <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> will <S%H6966>arise;<s%> and <S%H321>another<s%> will <S%H6966>arise<s%> <S%H311>after<s%> them, and he will be <S%H8133>different<s%> from the <S%H6933>previous<s%> <S%H6933>ones<s%> and will <S%H8214>subdue<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H4430>kings.<s%>

'And he will <S%H4449>speak<s%> out <S%H6655>against<s%> the <S%H5943>Most<s%> <S%H5943>High<s%> and <S%H1080>wear<s%> <S%H1080>down<s%> the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>Highest<s%> <S%H5946>One,<s%> and he will <S%H5452>intend<s%> to <S%H8133>make<s%> <S%H8133>alterations<s%> in <S%H2166>times<s%> and in <S%H1882>law;<s%> and they will be <S%H3052>given<s%> into his <S%H3028>hand<s%> for a <S%H5732>time,<s%> <S%H5732>times,<s%> and <S%H6387>half<s%> a <S%H5732>time.<s%>
'But the <S%H1780>court<s%> will <S%H3488>sit<s%> [for judgment,] and his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> will be <S%H5709>taken<s%> <S%H5709>away,<s%> <S%H8046>annihilated<s%> and destroyed <S%H7>forever.<s%>

'Then the <S%H4437>sovereignty,<s%> the <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> and the <S%H7238>greatness<s%> of <S%H3606>[all<s%>] the <S%H4437>kingdoms<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H8065>heaven<s%> will be <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H5972>people<s%> of the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>Highest<s%> <S%H5946>One;<s%> His <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> [will be] an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and all the <S%H7985>dominions<s%> will <S%H6399>serve<s%> and <S%H8086>obey<s%> Him.'
